TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableHeaderRow extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow

summary.span: 表示 控件的标题行。

span.span: Represents a heading row in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示控件中的标题行。 The class represents a heading row in a control. 此类支持在屏幕大小有限的设备上显示表。This class supports displaying tables on devices with a limited screen size. 在这些设备上, 必须在多个页中呈现包含多个列和行的表。On these devices, a table with many columns and rows must be rendered across multiple pages. 如果将添加 到控件,则可以指定在显示表视图的每一页上呈现为第一行的标题行。Adding a to a control allows you to specify a heading row that is rendered as the first row on each page that displays a view of the table. 有关屏幕大小限制的设备上呈现的表的视图格式的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information about the view formats for a table rendered on a device with a limited screen size, see . 对象只能包含对象。A object can contain only objects. 若要向添加内容, 必须将一个或多个对象添加到该行。To add content to the , you must add one or more objects to the row. 然后, 设置行中每个对象的属性以指定每个单元格的内容。Then, set the property of each object in the row to specify the contents of each cell. 或者, 您可以将控件添加到对象中以指定其内容。Alternatively, you can add a control to a object to specify its contents. 您可以 使用集合以编程方式管理中的单元格。You can programmatically manage the cells in the by using the collection. 集合是表示行中单元格的对象的集合。 The collection is a collection of objects that represent the cells in the row. 从继承属性, 使您能够控制行中内容的显示方式。The inherits properties from that allow you to control how the contents in the row are displayed. 例如, 你可以使用和属性来指定内容的对齐方式。For example, you can use the and properties to specify the alignment of the contents. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于创建 具有和的控件的声明性语法。The following code example demonstrates the declarative syntax for creating a control that has a and a . [!code-aspx-vb[TableHeaderRowClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableHeaderRowClass1/VB/tableheaderrowclass1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建一个具有和的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a control that has a and a . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[TableHeaderRowClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableHeaderRowClass2/CS/tableheaderrowclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableHeaderRowClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableHeaderRowClass2/VB/tableheaderrowclass2vb.aspx#1)]
